title: Track a Late Supplier Shipment
description: A purchase order from a key supplier is overdue. A manager needs to track the shipment and get an updated ETA.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the PO in the system and confirms it is past its expected delivery date.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to get the tracking number for the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an email to the supplier requesting the tracking information.

tasks.description: Use the tracking number to check the status with the freight carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the shipment is delayed at a port due to customs.

tasks.description: Update the expected delivery date in the system and notify the sales team of the delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the PO's ETA and informs the sales team.
